content: picnic folks top wan cheng phua © copyright 2023 knittygrittysg com construction the picnic folks top is a summer shirt that is knit top down with a pseudo saddle shoulder construction first neckline shaping is done by knitting flat back and forth with lacework on the shoulders the neckline is then joined in the round the yoke is knit in the round with shoulder and yoke increases then split for sleeves and body the body is knit in the round to desired length the sleeves are picked up and knit to short-sleeve length all hems are finished with i-cord bind off garment bust circumferences sizes 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 centimeters 79 89 99 109 119 130 140 150 160 inches 31 35 39 43 47 51 55 59 63 the top is designed to have about 5 cm 2 of positive ease around the bust the sample shown was knit in size 1 yarn suggested yarn oh folks co cloud cotton 5-ply worsted weight 60% cotton 40% acrylic blend 200 m per 100 g ball if you wish to use a yarn substitute make sure to have similar plant/synthetic fibre content to achieve the correct drape and breathability yarn quantities 2 3 3 4 4 5 5 6 6 balls wan cheng phua © copyright 2023 knittygrittysg com needles and gauge
